item.title: The Karla or Carlos Controversy Confounds Hollywood
item.description: Twists in the trans revolution upend film-industry journalism.

item.title: Intersex People Don’t Negate Trump’s Two-Sexes Executive Order
item.description: People with intersex conditions have long been used as the bait in the Left’s motte-and-bailey argument to declare sex mutable at will. Don’t buy it.

item.title: Republicans Should Support Workers — Not the Failed Union Model
item.description: Rather than double down on the Biden-Harris approach, as Senator Hawley proposes, the GOP can choose to put the American worker first.

item.title: Collectivism in the C-Suite
item.description: A review of A Tyranny for the Good of Its Victims , by Andy Puzder.

item.title: USAID Is a Failure
item.description: There will be legal issues ahead, but on the merits, overhauling the agency is worthy and important.
